column2: "Transfer to the front will occur momentarily. Your initial goal is to destroy the Falz Arms, to deplete the main body."

"/face6 This looks to be the
most dangerous battle yet.
Please... return safely."

"ARKS, this is an emergency! A planet-sized
Dark Falz has appeared, and is attacking
a nearby ship with thousands of its own
appendages. Each one appears to have a
will of its own.

Counter attack with full force, and
weaken Dark Falz to engage it directly.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated, time runs out"
